collection.name: Cool Pets NFT
collection.description: An NFT offering from the Cool Cats brand, Pets is a collection of 19,999 NFTs that are procedurally generated based on item interaction. All Pets start as an Egg and evolve into their final form, which represents one of four elements: Grass, Fire, Water, or Air. Users can evolve their Pet through our gamified experience on [coolcatsnft.com](https://coolcatsnft.com)â€“your final Pet is one of 17 million possible outcomes! To learn more about Pets, Eggs, and the world of Cooltopia, visit [cooltopia.coolcatsnft.com](https://cooltopia.coolcatsnft.com). We love the Pets!
